sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT attendance.status FROM class JOIN major ON class.major_id = major.id JOIN student ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN attendance ON attendance.student_id = student.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND attendance.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM base GROUP BY base.status

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”映射，probe_samples 显示 class.grade_year 候选值包含 '2022'，与原始值一致
根据字段描述“专业名称，专业实体映射主字段”映射，probe_samples 显示 major.major_name 候选值包含 '计算机科学与技术'，精确匹配
原始值“一班”在 probe_samples 中无直接匹配，但 class.class_name 候选值中存在“2022级计算机科学与技术1班”，结合 grade=2022 和 major=计算机科学与技术，推断“一班”对应“2022级计算机科学与技术1班”

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT attendance.status FROM class JOIN major ON class.major_id = major.id JOIN student ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN attendance ON attendance.student_id = student.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND attendance.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM base GROUP BY base.status
